```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
library(evd)

setwd("F:\\StreamFlow")
load("Stream.Rdata")
Stream <- Stream[Q >= 0]

Stream_plot <- Stream[, c("Site", "Q", "DecYear", "Month", "Region")]
```


###  Region 17 - 18

There are 18 regions totally. If we test all combinations, there will be ${18 \choose 2}=\frac{18!}{2!16!}=153$. So I select nearby regions firstly for a rude impression.

According to the web map and 
```{r}
ser1 <- Stream_plot[Region=="17"][,max(Q),by=.(DecYear, Month)][["V1"]]
ser2 <- Stream_plot[Region=="18"][,max(Q),by=.(DecYear, Month)][["V1"]]
par(mfrow = c(1,2))
chiplot(cbind(ser1,ser2))
mtext("17-18", 4)
```
